Bit.name: weapon uses old dual fire error code

ShortInteger.name: maximum alternate shots loaded
ShortInteger.description: if the second trigger loads alternate ammunition, this is the maximum number of shots that can be loaded at a time

RealFraction.name: heat recovery threshold
RealFraction.description: the heat value a weapon must return to before leaving the overheated state, once it has become overheated in the first place

RealFraction.name: overheated threshold
RealFraction.description: the heat value over which a weapon first becomes overheated (should be greater than the heat recovery threshold)

RealFraction.name: heat detonation threshold
RealFraction.description: the heat value above which the weapon has a chance of exploding each time it is fired

RealFraction.name: heat detonation fraction
RealFraction.description: the percent chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) the weapon will explode when fired over the heat detonation threshold

RealFraction.name: heat loss per second
RealFraction.description: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

RealFraction.name: heat illumination
RealFraction.description: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is overheated

RealFraction.name: overheated heat loss per second
RealFraction.description: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

Angle.name: magnetism angle
Angle.description: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

Real.name: magnetism range
Real.description: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

TagReference.name: lunge melee damage
TagReference.description: this is only important for the energy sword

TagReference.name: lunge melee response
TagReference.description: this is only important for the energy sword

Real.name: near reticle range
Real.description: the range at which the closer of the two static target reticles will be drawn

Real.name: far reticle range
Real.description: the range at which the farther of the two static target reticles will be drawn

Real.name: intersection reticle range
Real.description: the maximum range at which the dynamic target reticle will be drawn

ShortInteger.name: magnification levels
ShortInteger.description: the number of magnification levels this weapon allows

Angle.name: autoaim angle
Angle.description: the maximum angle that autoaim works at full strength

Real.name: autoaim range
Real.description: the maximum distance that autoaim works at full strength

Angle.name: magnetism angle
Angle.description: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength

Real.name: magnetism range
Real.description: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength

Angle.name: deviation angle
Angle.description: the maximum angle that a projectile is allowed to deviate from the gun barrel

Real.name: forward movement penalty
Real.description: percent slowdown to forward movement for units carrying this weapon

Real.name: sideways movement penalty
Real.description: percent slowdown to sideways and backward movement for units carrying this weapon

Real.name: age heat recovery penalty
Real.description: how much the weapon's heat recovery is penalized as it ages

Real.name: age rate of fire penalty
Real.description: how much the weapon's rate of fire is penalized as it ages

RealFraction.name: age misfire start
RealFraction.description: the age threshold when the weapon begins to misfire

RealFraction.name: age misfire chance
RealFraction.description: at age 1.0, the misfire chance per shot

Real.name: active camo ding
Real.description: how much to decrease active camo when a round is fired

Real.name: active camo regrowth rate
Real.description: how fast to increase active camo (per tick) when a round is fired

StringId.name: handle node
StringId.description: the node that get's attached to the unit's hand

Real.name: reload time
Real.description: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

Real.name: chamber time
Real.description: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

Real.name: reload time
Real.description: the length of time it takes to load a single magazine into the weapon

Real.name: chamber time
Real.description: the length of time it takes to chamber the next round

Explanation.name: $$$ WEAPON $$$
Explanation.description: All weapons should have 'primary trigger' and 'secondary trigger' markers as appropriate. Blurred permutations are called '$primary-blur' and '$secondary-blur'.

ShortInteger.name: maximum alternate shots loaded
ShortInteger.description: if the second trigger loads alternate ammunition, this is the maximum number of shots that can be loaded at a time

RealFraction.name: heat recovery threshold
RealFraction.description: the heat value a weapon must return to before leaving the overheated state, once it has become overheated in the first place

RealFraction.name: overheated threshold
RealFraction.description: the heat value over which a weapon first becomes overheated (should be greater than the heat recovery threshold)

RealFraction.name: heat detonation threshold
RealFraction.description: the heat value above which the weapon has a chance of exploding each time it is fired

RealFraction.name: heat detonation fraction
RealFraction.description: the percent chance (between 0.0 and 1.0) the weapon will explode when fired over the heat detonation threshold

RealFraction.name: heat loss per second
RealFraction.description: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

RealFraction.name: heat illumination
RealFraction.description: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is overheated

RealFraction.name: overheated heat loss per second
RealFraction.description: the amount of heat lost each second when the weapon is not being fired

Explanation.name: melee aim assist
Explanation.description: magnetism angle: the maximum angle that magnetism works at full strength magnetism range: the maximum distance that magnetism works at full strength throttle magnitude: additional throttle to apply towards target when melee-ing w/ magnetism throttle minimum distance: minimum distance to target that throttle magnetism kicks in throttle maximum adjustment angle: maximum angle throttle magnetism will have an effect, relative to the players movement throttle

Explanation.name: melee damage parameters
Explanation.description: damage pyramid angles: defines the frustum from the camera that the melee-attack uses to find targets damage pyramid depth: how far the melee attack searches for a target

ShortInteger.name: magnification levels
ShortInteger.description: the number of magnification levels this weapon allows

RealFraction.name: forward movement penalty
RealFraction.description: percent slowdown to forward movement for units carrying this weapon

RealFraction.name: sideways movement penalty
RealFraction.description: percent slowdown to sideways and backward movement for units carrying this weapon

Real.name: age heat recovery penalty
Real.description: how much the weapon's heat recovery is penalized as it ages

Real.name: age rate of fire penalty
Real.description: how much the weapon's rate of fire is penalized as it ages

RealFraction.name: age misfire start
RealFraction.description: the age threshold when the weapon begins to misfire

RealFraction.name: age misfire chance
RealFraction.description: at age 1.0, the misfire chance per shot

Real.name: active camo ding
Real.description: how much to decrease active camo when a round is fired

Real.name: active camo regrowth rate
Real.description: how fast to increase active camo (per tick) when a round is fired

StringId.name: handle node
StringId.description: the node that get's attached to the unit's hand

Real.name: charging time
Real.description: the amount of time it takes for this trigger to become fully charged

Real.name: charged time
Real.description: the amount of time this trigger can be charged before becoming overcharged

Real.name: charged illumination
Real.description: the amount of illumination given off when the weapon is fully charged

Real.name: spew time
Real.description: length of time the weapon will spew (fire continuously) while discharging

TagReference.name: charging effect
TagReference.description: the charging effect is created once when the trigger begins to charge

TagReference.name: charging damage effect
TagReference.description: the charging effect is created once when the trigger begins to charge

Bit.name: tracks fired projectile
Bit.description: poo poo ca ca pee pee

Bit.name: random firing effects
Bit.description: rather than being chosen sequentially, firing effects are picked randomly

Bit.name: can fire with partial ammo
Bit.description: allows a weapon to be fired as long as there is a non-zero amount of ammunition loaded

Bit.name: projectiles use weapon origin
Bit.description: instead of coming out of the magic first person camera origin, the projectiles for this weapon actually come out of the gun

Bit.name: ejects during chamber
Bit.description: this trigger's ejection port is started during the key frame of its chamber animation

Bit.name: projectile vector cannot be adjusted
Bit.description: projectiles fired by this weapon cannot have their direction adjusted by the AI to hit the target

Bit.name: projectiles fire parallel
Bit.description: If there are multiple guns for this trigger, the projectiles emerge in parallel beams (rather than independant aiming)

Bit.name: don't clear fire bit after recovering

RealBounds.name: rounds per second
RealBounds.description: the number of firing effects created per second

Real.name: acceleration time
Real.description: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final rounds per second

Real.name: deceleration time
Real.description: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return from its final rounds per second to its initial

RealFraction.name: blurred rate of fire
RealFraction.description: a percentage between 0 and 1 which controls how soon in its firing animation the weapon blurs

ShortBounds.name: shots per fire
ShortBounds.description: allows designer caps to the shots you can fire from one firing action

Real.name: fire recovery time
Real.description: how long after a set of shots it takes before the barrel can fire again

RealFraction.name: soft recovery fraction
RealFraction.description: how much of the recovery allows shots to be queued

ShortBlockIndex.name: magazine
ShortBlockIndex.description: the magazine from which this trigger draws its ammunition

ShortInteger.name: rounds per shot
ShortInteger.description: the number of rounds expended to create a single firing effect

ShortInteger.name: minimum rounds loaded
ShortInteger.description: the minimum number of rounds necessary to fire the weapon

ShortInteger.name: rounds between tracers
ShortInteger.description: the number of non-tracer rounds fired between tracers

ShortEnum.name: firing noise
ShortEnum.description: how loud this weapon appears to the AI

Real.name: acceleration time
Real.description: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

Real.name: deceleration time
Real.description: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

RealBounds.name: damage error
RealBounds.description: the range of angles (in degrees) that a damaged weapon will skew fire

Real.name: acceleration time
Real.description: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final error

Real.name: deceleration time
Real.description: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial error

RealPoint3D.name: first person offset
RealPoint3D.description: +x is forward, +z is up, +y is left

Real.name: ejection port recovery time
Real.description: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the ejection port to transition from 1.0 (open) to 0.0 (closed) after a shot has been fired

Real.name: illumination recovery time
Real.description: the amount of time (in seconds) it takes the illumination function to transition from 1.0 (bright) to 0.0 (dark) after a shot has been fired

RealFraction.name: heat generated per round
RealFraction.description: the amount of heat generated each time the trigger is fired

RealFraction.name: age generated per round
RealFraction.description: the amount the weapon ages each time the trigger is fired

Real.name: overload time
Real.description: the next trigger fires this often while holding down this trigger

AngleBounds.name: angle change per shot
AngleBounds.description: angle change per shot of the weapon during firing

Real.name: acceleration time
Real.description: the continuous firing time it takes for the weapon to achieve its final angle change per shot

Real.name: deceleration time
Real.description: the continuous idle time it takes for the weapon to return to its initial angle change per shot

ShortEnum.name: angle change function
ShortEnum.description: function used to scale between initial and final angle change per shot

Block.name: firing effects
Block.description: firing effects determine what happens when this trigger is fired

ShortInteger.name: shot count lower bound
ShortInteger.description: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

ShortInteger.name: shot count upper bound
ShortInteger.description: the maximum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen

TagReference.name: firing effect
TagReference.description: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

TagReference.name: misfire effect
TagReference.description: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

TagReference.name: empty effect
TagReference.description: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

TagReference.name: firing damage
TagReference.description: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded and fired normally

TagReference.name: misfire damage
TagReference.description: this effect is used when the weapon is loaded but fired while overheated

TagReference.name: empty damage
TagReference.description: this effect is used when the weapon is not loaded

ShortInteger.description: the minimum number of times this firing effect will be used, once it has been chosen
